message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000.  It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I'm willing to negotiate, $9,500 is still a bit below my minimum. I'm happy to meet you halfway at $9,750. This would be a fair price for both of us. What do you say?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $9,600 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to me.
